snippet.title: SMASH+GRAB | Early Access Launch Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam today: http://store.steampowered.com/app/412720/

Get ready for SMASH+GRAB, an underground competition where gangs of the future battle it out for loot, weapons, and infamy inside a corporate urban dystopia.

Choose from a growing selection of faction-themed characters to assemble your own crew. Customize your style and gameplay from hundreds of perks and clothing items. Then, team up with other players to fight, loot, and craft lethal weapons to come out on top.

A fast-paced mix of melee and ranged third-person fighting, SMASH+GRAB offers a fresh new take on competitive multiplayer action.

https://www.playsmashandgrab.com/
http://store.steampowered.com/app/412720/

Follow Us
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SmashGrabGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SmashAndGrabGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/smashgrabgame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/SyszAqn
Steam Forums: http://steamcommunity.com/app/412720/discussions/

Contact Us
community@unitedfrontgames.com
press@unitedfrontgames.com
